lead_paragraph: As we have seen, a range of authorities have collected the words that define the social, economic and geopolitical trends of 2009.
snippet: This new year's weekend, co-vocabularists are invited to suggest the words and phrases which encapsulate for them the year just passed. - If she accepted your hand in marriage, the word might be "yes". If it was good news from a doctor, the word...
abstract: This new year's weekend, co-vocabularists are invited to suggest the words and phrases which encapsulate for them the year just passed. - If she accepted your hand in marriage, the word might be "yes". If it was good news from a doctor, the word might be "benign." If the recession took its toll close to home, the word might be "foreclosure."
